Description:
â€‹** NS uses the number of luma registrations for capacity and space planning, so please make sure to register here on luma so we can reserve the right space **

â€‹The first in a series of NS hackathons! For the first iteration, we're going to start short and sweet with a 1-day mini-hackathon. All skill levels are welcome, and we'll also do some beginner workshops and mentoring before the event for people who want to skill-up beforehand. (see Alex's AI Mind Meld luma events, and ping @spaceprincess if you'd like some more help getting comfortable.)

â€‹The theme is likely to be "vibe coding": making things with 99% AI, so you actually don't need any coding skills. Welcome to the future. We'll also have mentors to help as needed!

â€‹Judging: @yashluna, @jacksonofalltrades, and other surprise guests have kindly agreed to be on the judging panel! Some of the things we'll be looking for are originality, relevance to the NS community, and future-orientedness.

â€‹Preliminary schedule:

â€‹12 noon: everybody gathers for quick intro meeting, learn about judging criteria, prizes, q & a, etc.

â€‹~~ hacking ~~

â€‹5 pm: hacking complete, everybody gathers for presentations and celebrations

â€‹6 pm: dinner!

â€‹

â€‹Questions? Come to the hackathons thread on Discord: https://discord.com/channels/900827411917201418/1343912349278408798

Description:
â€‹Reasoning -

â€‹The sounds aa, oo, and mm activate three different chakras in the body (aligned to areas near the stomach, heart and throat) - which inturn allows energy to flow within and through the body seamlessly. Immediately after, sitting in silence while focusing on the area between the eyes, allows us to feel the difference in energy flow and reset accordingly.

Title: Positive Manifestation Meditation
Location: VIP Room 8, 13th Floor, Forest City Marina Hotel
Description:
â€‹Positive Manifestation Meditation Session

â€‹Join us for a transformative Positive Manifestation Meditation session designed to help you align your thoughts and intentions with your deepest desires. This group meditation will guide you through a journey of self-discovery, positivity, and manifestation.

â€‹What to Expect:

â€‹- **Guided Meditation:** Our experienced facilitator will lead you through a calming and focused meditation, helping you to quiet the mind and open your heart to the possibilities within.

â€‹- **Positive Affirmations:** Learn how to use positive affirmations to reinforce your intentions and attract abundance into your life.

â€‹- **Group Energy:** Experience the amplified energy of a group setting, where collective intentions can create a powerful ripple effect.

â€‹- **Sharing Circle:** After the meditation, there will be an optional sharing circle where you can discuss your experiences and insights with fellow participants.

â€‹Benefits:

â€‹- Reduce stress and anxiety

â€‹- Enhance mental clarity and focus

â€‹- Cultivate a positive mindset

â€‹- Attract and manifest your goals and dreams

â€‹Who Should Attend:

â€‹- Anyone seeking to bring more positivity and abundance into their life

â€‹- Those interested in the power of manifestation and the law of attraction

â€‹- Individuals looking to connect with a like-minded community

â€‹What to Bring:

â€‹- Comfortable clothing

â€‹- A yoga mat or cushion (if preferred)

â€‹- An open mind and heart

â€‹

â€‹We look forward to seeing you there! Let's come together to manifest our dreams and create a brighter future.

â€‹This event will take place after the Vipassana meditation on the 13th floor.

Title: Qualia Research Institute watch & discuss
Description:
QRI (https://qri.org/) is a "Hands-on Consciousness Research Think Tank" that intends to "characterize the phenomenology and the observed dynamics of exotic states."

â€‹Practically, this means attempting to understand how the brain processes perception and sensory phenomena, in order to increase our understanding of ourselves and how our brains work.

â€‹We'll watch about 10 minutes of introductory video together, and then have plenty of time for freeform discussion!

Title: PaperTrail - NS Documentation Collective
Description:
â€‹PaperTrail is a documentation collective dedicated to capturing the evolving Blueprint for Network Societies as envisioned by Network School v2. We document, analyze, and refine the frameworks that enable decentralized, resilient, and globally connected communities.

â€‹Through structured records, insightful case studies, and collaborative discussions, we ensure that the principles and methodologies shaping the future of Network Societies are accessible, adaptable, and actionable.

Title: Blitz chess tournament @ NS ğŸ…
Description:
â€‹We'll be playing 6 rounds, with each game set at 5 minutes per player plus a 5-second increment per move (Swiss system).

â€‹Come test your quick-thinking skills, meet fellow chess fans, and enjoy a friendly yet competitive atmosphere. See you on Floor 13!

Title: Book Discussion: The DOSE Effect
Description:
This is the best book you'll read this year.

â€‹If you loved Atomic Habits, you will love The DOSE Effect even more.

â€‹If you've not read the book, we'll discuss a short summary and get you started on your DOSE journey.

â€‹This book helps you balance your brain chemistry with simple habits. It is extremely accessible, and teaches you to regulate your Dopamine, Oxytocin, Serotonin and Endorphine from the very first page.

â€‹If you're into self-improvement, or just want to level up your energy and mental focus, join us âœ¨
